description: As the group boards a riverboat, gorgeous Thomas Belko (also known as Roman Paulik from Siberian Heat) escapes to a dark corner of the men's room to provide oral relief to a line of giant cocks: Josef Beniak, Oto Burian, Matus Otava, Kristoff Junas and Alexander Strauss, who also gets a crack at Belko's ass.
title: Wide Open
